name: Ascent Spirit
description: Equipped with two improvised ice axes in Ascent Spirit, your only chance of survival is to reach the top of this sacred mountain and get back to your hot air balloon before the winds free it.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: AMD 290 / NVIDIA GTX 970 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1160 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
